packdinar.text1: If you enjoyed our activities and want to enjoy also a homemade lunch or breakfast, "Can Pep" is your place.

dinar.1: Castellfollit Aventura menu for 11 euros from Monday to Friday.
dinar.2: Castellfollit Aventura menu for 18 euros Saturday, Sunday and holidays.

esmorzar.1: Castellfollit Aventura menu for 6 euros from Monday to Friday.
esmorzar.2: Castellfollit Aventura menu for 8 euros Saturday, Sunday and holidays.
